title: Introducing: Sweet Williams
body:
The new project from Tom House, frontman of much-missed Brighton post-punk outfit Charlottefield, **Sweet Williams** take the chiming dissonance of their helmsman’s alma mater and drag it through a mile of molasses, before welding the whole sludgy mess together with a noisy, sputtering blowtorch.

Vaguely threatening bluesy drone, and moments of surprising beauty, for today’s discerning young thing.

Full length album **_Bliss_** is available for download over at Sweet Williams’ [bandcamp](http://sweetwilliams.bandcamp.com/album/bliss "It's late and I'm alone and I can't think of much I'd rather be listening to.") for a mere £5, or you can splash out on the vinyl from [Endless Love](http://www.endlessloverecords.com/menu.html "Don't think it's working yet, mind.").
